Package app.security.secretFactory

Class AbstractSecretFactory<T>

java.lang.Object
app.security.secretFactory.AbstractSecretFactory<T>
Type Parameters:
T - may be a bytes array or a String. Type of the created secret key
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmailTokenFactory, JwtKeyFactory, RefreshFactory, SaltFactory, SocketIdFactory, StateFactory
public abstract class AbstractSecretFactory<T>
extends java.lang.Object
Parses secure pseudo-random string

Must be extended by the class intended for parsing a specified secret key.

Child class must have a constructor doesn't requesting key, length and calling AbstractSecretFactory(int) with standard key length for class' secret key type.

Child class must override a create(). This overriding should return result of rndString() or rndBytes() depend on the required type of the secret key.

  • Method Details

    • rndString

      protected java.lang.String rndString()
      Creates secure pseudo-random string. Should be used in the create() of the specified child class.
      Returns:
      created string

    • rndBytes

      private byte[] rndBytes​(int length)
      Creates secure pseudo-random bytes array. Should be used in the create() of the specified child class.
      Parameters:
      length - amount of elements in the array
      Returns:
      created bytes array

    • rndBytes

      Returns:

    • create

      public abstract T create()
      Creates secure pseudo-random key of the specified type. Must be overridden with proxying to rndString() or rndBytes()
      Returns:
      created key of the specified type
